raw_result.Analysis Notes: All four documents retrieved are meeting agendas for Truro City Council. Three of them appear to contain potential information relevant to customer queries concerning waste management and cleaning services, while the fourth document is less clear about its relevance.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: Items 1 and 2 were identified as the most likely to contain relevant information for customers inquiring about council services, particularly waste disposal and cleaning. However, it's important to note that Item 3 may still provide useful insights into council matters.
